\[\begin{tikzcd}
	{\Gamma.A} \\
	\\
	\\
	\Gamma && \Delta && {\Delta.A[\sigma]}
	\arrow["\sigma", from=4-3, to=4-1]
	\arrow["{p_{A[\sigma]}}", from=4-5, to=4-3]
	\arrow["{p_{A}}"', from=1-1, to=4-1]
	\arrow["{(\sigma \circ p_{A[\sigma]}, q_{A[\sigma]})}"', dashed, from=4-5, to=1-1]
\end{tikzcd}\]
